nodes.text: Telleon was a male Twi'lek foreman residing on Quesh around 3642 BBY, when he was killed.

Telleon appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Quesh. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
